description: The office accepted that the tweet, which made a joke about visa applications, was insensitive.
title: German foreign office sorry for #SeduceSomeoneInFourWords tweet
title_page: German foreign office sorry for #SeduceSomeoneInFourWords tweet - BBC News
maintext: Criminologist Galma Akdeniz added: "If your visa application did not make people feel less than human, it might have been funny. But it does. So this is gloating in your discretionary power, laughing at people who are subjected to it. Not cool, and quite out of touch."
